data.communities: N/A. I may bring up the interface issue with other GPS::* developers
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
A module is needed to communicate with Lowrance GPSs.

    Note that this is separate from GPS::Lowrance::LSI, which just
    implements the protocol for communicating with Lowrance GPSs.

    (The issue of why every GPS::* module has a seemingly incompatible
    interface is different and will not be addressed in this module,
    although it may have an interface which mirrors one of the existing
    modules.)
